00039 TelnetServer::TelnetServer(Shell& CLI_Shell, const unsigned long UL_TcpPort)
00040   : m_cliShell(CLI_Shell),
00041     m_ulTcpPort(UL_TcpPort)

00043 }

00048 
00049 void TelnetServer::StartServer(void)
00050 {
00051     const int i_ServerSocket = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
00052     if (i_ServerSocket < 0)
00053     {
00054         m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << "socket failed" << endl;
00055         return;
00056     }
00057 
00058     struct sockaddr_in s_SockAddr;
00059     s_SockAddr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00060     s_SockAddr.sin_port = htons((unsigned short) m_ulTcpPort);
00061     s_SockAddr.sin_addr.s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
00062 
00063     if (bind(i_ServerSocket, (struct sockaddr*) & s_SockAddr, sizeof(s_SockAddr)) < 0)
00064     {
00065         close(i_ServerSocket);
00066         m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << "bind failed" << endl;
00067         return;
00068     }
00069 
00070     if (listen(i_ServerSocket, 5) < 0)
00071     {
00072         close(i_ServerSocket);
00073         m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << "listen failed" << endl;
00074         return;
00075     }
00076 
00077     while (1)
00078     {
00079         std::cout << "Waiting for clients..." << std::endl;
00080         const int i_ConnectionSocket = accept(i_ServerSocket, NULL, NULL);
00081 
00082         if (i_ConnectionSocket < 0)
00083         {
00084             close(i_ServerSocket);
00085             m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << "accept failed" << endl;
00086             return;
00087         }
00088 
00089         std::cout << "Accepting telnet connection" << std::endl;
00090         if (! AcceptConnection(i_ConnectionSocket))
00091         {
00092             return;
00093         }
00094     }
00095 }
00096 
00097 const bool TelnetServer::AcceptConnection(const int I_ConnectionSocket)
00098 {
00099 #if CLI_TELNET_MULTI_CLIENT
00100     if (int i_Pid = fork())
00101     {
00102         // Server side.
00103         return true;
00104     }
00105     else
00106 #endif
00107     {
00108         // Connection side.
00109         std::cout << "Connection " << getpid() << " started" << std::endl;
00110         TelnetConnection* const pcli_Connection = new TelnetConnection(m_cliShell, I_ConnectionSocket, true);
00111         m_cliShell.Run(*pcli_Connection);
00112         std::cout << "Connection " << getpid() << " done" << std::endl;
00113 #if CLI_TELNET_MULTI_CLIENT
00114         exit(0);
00115 #endif
00116         return true;
00117     }
00118 }

00140 const bool TelnetConnection::CloseDevice(void)
00141 {
00142 #if CLI_TELNET_MULTI_CLIENT

00144 #endif
00145     delete this;
00146     return true;

00149 const KEY TelnetConnection::GetKey(void) const
00150 {
00151     if (! m_qiChars.empty())
00152     {
00153         // Dequeue the received characters
00154         const int i_Front = m_qiChars.front();
00155         m_qiChars.pop_front();
00156 
00157         // Special character management.
00158         switch (i_Front)
00159         {
00160         case 27:
00161             if (! m_qiChars.empty())
00162             {
00163                 if ((m_qiChars.front() == 91) && (m_qiChars.size() >= 2))
00164                 {
00165                     m_qiChars.pop_front();
00166                     const int i_Special = m_qiChars.front();
00167                     m_qiChars.pop_front();
00168 
00169                     switch (i_Special)
00170                     {
00171                     case 65: return KEY_UP;
00172                     case 66: return KEY_DOWN;
00173                     case 67: return KEY_RIGHT;
00174                     case 68: return KEY_LEFT;
00175                     default:
00176                         // Unhandled.
00177                         m_qiChars.push_front(i_Special);
00178                         m_qiChars.push_front(91);
00179                     }
00180                 }
00181             }
00182             break;
00183 
00184         case 8:
00185             return BACKSPACE;
00186         }
00187 
00188         const KEY e_Char = IODevice::GetKey(i_Front);
00189         if (e_Char != NULL_KEY)
00190         {
00191             return e_Char;
00192         }
00193         else
00194         {
00195             return GetKey();
00196         }
00197     }
00198     else
00199     {
00200         // Wait for characters
00201         char str_Buffer[256];
00202         const int i_Len = recv(m_iSocket, str_Buffer, 256, 0);
00203         if (i_Len <= 0)
00204         {
00205             m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << "recv failed" << endl;
00206             return NULL_KEY;
00207         }
00208         else
00209         {
00210             for (int i=0; i<i_Len; i++)
00211             {
00212                 if (str_Buffer[i] != '\0')
00213                 {
00214                     m_qiChars.push_back(str_Buffer[i]);
00215                 }
00216             }
00217             return GetKey();
00218         }
00219     }
00220 }
00221 
00222 void TelnetConnection::PutString(const std::string& STR_Out) const
00223 {
00224     const int i_Len = send(m_iSocket, STR_Out.c_str(), STR_Out.size(), 0);
00225     if (i_Len < 0)
00226     {
00227         m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << "send failed" << endl;
00228     }
00229     else if ((unsigned) i_Len < STR_Out.size())
00230     {
00231         m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM)
00232             << "send uncomplete"
00233             << " (only " << i_Len << " characters sent"
00234             << " over " << STR_Out.size() << ")" << endl;
00235     }
00236     else if ((unsigned) i_Len > STR_Out.size())
00237     {
00238         m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM)
00239             << "weird send return value"
00240             << " (" << i_Len << " for " << STR_Out.size() << " characters sent)" << endl;
00241     }
00242 }
